name: Bea & Brolly
description:
A 2.5D platformer in which you control Beatrix in a world immersed in chaos and navigate drafts with Brolly, your magical umbrella. Run and float among the dangers that await you above the clouds and try to save the world from destruction.

Navigate the wind currents and explore the scenario to rescue the little Pucks, assistants of the imprisoned wizards.

The game allow for different strategies, so think carefully about the right time to float or just be safe on the ground.

There is a link for a feedback form at the end of the level, but in case that you don't want to finish it:
